message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, I can't go quite that low. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $14,000. Can we meet in the middle again?
